snippet.title: Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot - Nintendo Switch Trailer
snippet.description:
Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot, the most expansive and accurate retelling of the epic story of Goku, is coming to NINTENDO Switch.

Starting September 24th, play the game everywhere, meeting beloved friends, battling powerful enemies and reliving one of the most iconic story from the arrival of Raditz to the final fight against Buu! 
 
The NINTENDO Switch version will include the - A NEW POWER AWAKENS SET. It will allow you to fight two exclusives bosses Beerus and Golden Frieza while unlocking the godly transformations for Goku and Vegeta. 
 
The DLC - TRUNKS THE WARRIOR OF HOPE – will be available on the eShop from launch.
